footer.join_activation: Enjoy these perks when you activate your account:

email_form.subheader_html:
Don't be shy, say hi!
Hit us up with your comments, questions, requests, or suggestions!

Didn't find what you need on our FAQs page? Reach out to +639399101047
or complete the form below and weâ€™ll gladly assist you. Our Customer Care Team is available from Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm.

map.auth_error_html: There was a problem authenticating your Google Maps account. Create and enable the JavaScript API and Geocoding API permissions of your app.

general.title: Cart
general.note_placeholder: Place your order notes here. If you need to include landmarks, notes and other details about your order/shipping details, you may also include them here.
general.shipping_at_checkout: Shipping and discount codes calculated at checkout.
general.terms: I agree with the terms and conditions
general.terms_html: I agree with the terms and conditions
general.terms_confirm: You must agree with the terms and conditions of sales to check out
general.cart_drawer_notification_html: Enjoy {{promo}}, just add {{ difference }} to your order!
general.cart_drawer_success_message_html: Hurrah! Enjoy the â‚±200 off!
general.gift_info: Sending as a gift means that a Penshoppe gift receipt will be used. A gift receipt shows proof of purchase but leaves out the amount spent - perfect for gifts!
general.gift_info_cod: Orders made through cash-on-delivery cannot be sent as gifts.
general.errors: We found some errors in your cart:
general.fragrance_notif: Oops! For Visayas and Mindanao orders, we have a liquid volume of 1,000mL per order due to delivery regulations ðŸ˜ž Please limit the total volume of your fragrances, lotions or sanitizers to 1,000mL per order only.
general.soldier_html:
Due to limited stocks, purchases of Penshoppe with BT21 items are limited to 3 pcs per style per person.
Kindly update your cart to proceed.
general.soldier_warning_html:
Due to limited stocks, purchases of Penshoppe with BT21 items are limited to 3 pcs per style per person.

general.terms_auto_html: Proceeding with your order constitutes acceptance to our terms and conditions.

address_finder.label: Address Finder
address_finder.guide: For quicker shipping address entry, find your area from the drop down fields.
address_finder.guide_html:
Find your area from the drop down fields.
You may only enter letters on First & Last Name fields and digits only on Phone field.
address_finder.warning: Please provide complete address to avoid cancellation.

gwp.note_html: Select a maximum of {{limit}} products from the choices in the dropdown below.
gwp.exclusive_availability_html: Sorry, this product would only be available to you for purchase starting on <strong>{{availability}}<strong>.
gwp.progress_bar_html: Get a FREE {{ gwp_type }}! Just add {{ needed_amount }} to your order!

preorder.employee_note: *Note: You may use Salary Deduction as payment option by choosing 'Pick it up' and 'Cash on Delivery' on checkout. Choosing 'Cash on Delivery' for non-pickup orders will have your order be automatically cancelled.
preorder.non_emp_note: *Note: Cart with preorder items shouldn't use Cash on Delivery (COD) as payment option at checkout. If the customer still chooses COD, the order will automatically be cancelled.
preorder.warning_message_html: All {{ preorder_text }} paid via Cash on Delivery (COD) will automatically be {{ cancelled }}. Only prepaid orders (GCash or Credit/Debit card) are accepted.
preorder.mix: Sorry, preorder and regular items can't be ordered together at the moment. You may either:
preorder.exclusive: Sorry, preorder items are only available to certain customers at the moment.

general.no_matches: Sorry, there are no products in this collection.
general.coming_soon: Get into our waitlist to get notified and get first dibs of the item.
